Constraints¶

Abstract classes represent constraints on text adversarial examples.

class constraints.constraint.Constraint[source]¶

An abstract class that represents constraints on adversial text examples. A constraint evaluates if (x,x_adv) meets a certain constraint.

call_many(x, x_adv_list, original_text=None)[source]¶

Filters x_adv_list to x_adv where C(x,x_adv) is true.

Parameters

  • x –

  • x_adv_list –

  • original_text (type, optional) – Defaults to None.
